CTR.Q: What type of chart is this?

VEC.Q: How many series are represented in this stream chart?

SRP.Q: What is the vertical (above/below) relationship of the area representing Echo Trade relative to Silverleaf Emporium?
SRP.A: Echo Trade is {below} Silverleaf Emporium in the vertical direction.

SRP.Q: What is the vertical (above/below) relationship of the area representing Silverleaf Emporium relative to Crimson Bazaar?
SRP.A: Silverleaf Emporium is {above} Crimson Bazaar in the vertical direction.

SRP.Q: What is the vertical (above/below) relationship of the area representing Echo Trade relative to Crimson Bazaar?
SRP.A: Echo Trade is {above} Crimson Bazaar in the vertical direction.

VPR.Q: Which series contributes the largest portion to the total price index?
VPR.A: The series with the largest contribution is {Echo Trade}.

VPR.Q: Which series contributes the smallest portion to the total price index?
VPR.A: The series with the smallest contribution is {Nova Exchange}.

EVJ.Q: Which year is Nova Exchange's maximum Price Index in the streamgraph?
EVJ.A: Nova Exchange's maximum Price Index is in {1979}.

EVJ.Q: Which year is Crimson Bazaar's maximum Price Index in the streamgraph?
EVJ.A: Crimson Bazaar's maximum Price Index is in {1985}.

NC.Q: Was the total Price Index in 1979 higher or lower than in 1988?
NC.A: The total price index in 1979 was {lower} than in 1988.

NC.Q: Between 1986 and 1987, did the total Price Index experience a larger or smaller change than between 1982 and 1987?
NC.A: The change in total price index between 1986 and 1987 was {larger} than between 1982 and 1987.

NC.Q: Was the total Price Index in 1983 higher or lower than in 1984?
NC.A: The total price index in 1983 was {lower} than in 1984.

NC.Q: Was the total Price Index in 1979 higher or lower than in 1987?
NC.A: The total price index in 1979 was {lower} than in 1987.

MSR.Q: In this streamgraph, which one held the dominant position for the longest period of time?
MSR.A: {Echo Trade} held the dominant position for the longest period of time.

MSR.Q: In this streamgraph, in which year did Nova Exchange and Echo Trade first exchange dominant positions?
MSR.A: Nova Exchange and Echo Trade first exchanged leading positions in {1980}.
